sentences.sentence: I adore Sunday lunch with all the trimmings: roast meat, along with lots of vegetables and sauces and other traditional accompaniments.
sentences.translation: 我喜欢周日的午餐，里面有各种各样的佐料：烤肉，还有很多蔬菜、酱汁和其他传统的佐料。

sentences.sentence: To help meet this difficulty, film distributing companies started the practice of publishing Suggestions for musical accompaniments.
sentences.translation: 为了解决以上的困难，电影发行公司开办了为音乐伴奏印制提示单的业务。

sentences.sentence: Be prepared to play your accompaniments and teach them to others to play live on real drums. And this means: make accompaniments that are playable.
sentences.translation: 准备好表演你的伴奏作品，以及教导其他同学在实际的鼓上表演这样的作品。其意思是：使得伴奏作品是可以演奏的。
